mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_exam as te inner join tbl_lecture as tl on te.examLectureIdx = tl.lectureIdx

select te.examIdx, te.examLectureIdx, tl.lectureTitle, te.examTitle, te.examDescription, te.examCreatedAt from tbl_exam as te inner join tbl_lecture as tl on te.examLectureIdx = tl.lectureIdx where te.examIdx = #{idx}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_exam (examLectureIdx, examTitle, examDescription) values (#{examLectureIdx}, #{examTitle}, #{examDescription})
